question: Which Indian grabbed the highest rank in India, in the Forbes' ranking of 100 most powerful women in the world?
explanation:
Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman is ranked at 41st rank in the Forbes' ranking of 100 most powerful women in the world, grabbing the highest place.
HCL Corporation CEO and Executive Director Roshni Nadar Malhotra in the 55th spot and Biocon Founder Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw in the 68th rank. German Chancellor Angela Merkel is placed at the first spot.
